attributes.title: How is this an app?!?
attributes.review: Worst app I have ever used! It’s so inaccurate, it’s like it states bias opinions over actual literary, Scientific, and lawful facts. I can’t believe the App Store allowed this underwhelming piece of trash to be an app. I really hope its removed. Please don’t waste your time with this racist.. I mean waste of an app. 🧚🏾🧚🏿‍♂️🧚🏿‍♂️🧚🏽‍♂️🧚🏽

attributes.title: Highly do not recommend!!!
attributes.review: Once app was downloaded my phone started to glitch and not allow to me open any other app. After deleting only ads for Cheetos, hair pieces and racist related ads popped up on all my social media. HIGHLY don’t recommend.

attributes.title: Scary App
attributes.review: I found hateful things on here and worse yet I think they’re organizing to spread hateful messages.  They could even be meeting in our communities. I swear they’re taking my data and selling it to China. I’ve been targeted with ads left and right that are oddly suspicious.

attributes.title: I HAVE NIGHTMARES NOW
attributes.review: I opened the app now I’m scared to sleep the Cheeto man keeps coming for me in my sleep. When I wake up his face is now on my lock screen 🤮I’m compulsively throwing up every time I wake up ever since I downloaded the app. There must be a glitch with it...I don’t know. I just want it to end

attributes.title: Horrible do not get
attributes.review: When I opened and signed up a weird pedo texted me for nudes and harassed me and when I said no the KGB came a killed my whole family I do not recommend. Also on the app it it shows an ugly Oompa Loompa which I know for a fact that my dear willy wonka would never hire

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!😡
attributes.review: First of all, this app took forever to download! Once it downloaded it made my phone heat up so I put it in rice & ofc, the rice worked🧚🏼‍♀️💫✨ but then when I tried opening the app again, my screen froze. This is app is hard to navigate. I just wanted to support the man himself Ronald McDonald Trump 🤡😓😓

attributes.title: I can’t believe this app even exist 🥰🥰👉👈✨😘💖💕
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and I was hacked !! They took all of my credit card info and personal data😳 they sent messages to all my contacts with one line of message “Tiktok will not go down without a fight.”

attributes.title: Absolutely Bad
attributes.review: When I try to start up the app nothing shows up... it’s a blank screen and I had to restart my phone a couple of times! 😡😡 unexeceptable, waste of my time, and honestly who would want to install this app? Horrible.

attributes.title: App is straight booty cheeks!
attributes.review: I installed this app and finally after 27 hours 34 minutes and 13 seconds it finally downloaded only for it to then hack my phone, kidnap my brother and leave a message saying vote for trump or else. 0/10 wouldn’t recommend.

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: If you are planning to download this app I would think otherwise. After waiting the full 2 and a half hours to download it wouldn’t open. The app would proceed to close out the second I opened the app. In my opinion it’s a waste of storage
